system.description:
Choose one damage type from the following: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

When you deal damage of that type, you can treat a creature with immunity to that damage as though it only had resistance, and you can treat a creature with resistance to that damage type as though it did not have resistance. 

When you roll for damage with your chosen damage type against a creature with neither immunity or resistance against it, re-roll any damage dice which land on a 1 until each damage die lands on a 2 or higher; replace the result.
